column1: #: description: The nuclear modification factors $R_{p+A}^{\rm{FONLL}}(p_{\rm{T}})$ of $B^{+}$ measured in $p$ + Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_{NN}} = 5.02$ TeV.  The statistical and systematic uncertainties on the $p$ + Pb data are shown
column2: followed by upper and lower systematic uncertainties from the FONLL predictions.

column1: #: keyword reactions: P PB --> B+ X
